itemDescription: Steamed rice and lentil cakes, served with sambar and chutney.
Thin crispy pancake made from fermented rice and lentil batter, served with sambar and chutney.
Deep-fried lentil donut, served with sambar and chutney.
Thick pancake made from fermented rice and lentil batter, topped with vegetables, served with sambar and chutney.
Rice cooked with grated coconut and spices.
Aromatic rice dish cooked with basmati rice, spices, and meat or vegetables.
